File.Title: What was the age distribution of the vaccinees in the Phase III trial?
File.HtmlText: The age distribution across the 5-17 months age category was evenly spread in the trial (mean age at enrolment 11 months). For the 6-12 weeks age category, most infants were at the younger end when first dose of DTP vaccine is usually given (mean age at enrolment 7 weeks).
File.SubTopic: DESIGN OF THE LARGE PHASE III EFFICACY STUDY
